writer.name: 阿特勒·布兰克塞特 Atle Blakseth

director.name: 埃纳尔·敦塞德 Einar Dunsæd
阿特勒·布兰克塞特 Atle Blakseth

introduction: 一天晚上，爸爸穿着西装打领带，带着给儿子的礼物出现在窗前，这比生活更重要。爸爸很强壮很勇敢——他把动物从圈养中解放出来，用他的超高速汽车赢得比赛，潜入海洋深处。爸爸是个巫师，他能让自己神奇地出现和消失。这部动画片以柔和的画面讲述了一个孩子对他缺席的父亲的强烈渴望。Larger than life, dressed in suit and tie, papa appears at the window one evening, with a gift for his son. Papa is strong and brave – he frees animals from captivity, wins races with his superfast car, dives down into the depths of the ocean. Papa is a sorcerer who can make himself appear and disappear magically. In gently illustrated images, this animated film tells of a child’s poignant longing for his absent father.
